completion: Funeral Advantage is Lincoln Heritage’s leading final expense insurance plan designed to help cover funeral and burial costs. It’s simple, affordable, and accessible for most seniors.

prompt: How much is a $10,000 policy for a 65 year old non-smoker?
completion: For a 65-year-old non-smoker, the monthly premium for a $10,000 policy is approximately $61.06 for females and $74.12 for males, plus a $3.00 policy fee. Let’s connect you with an agent to confirm the rate and answer questions.

prompt: Do I need a medical exam?
completion: Nope! No medical exam is required—just a few health questions. Most people qualify. Would you like to speak with a licensed agent today?
If your diabetes doesn’t include complications, you may still qualify for full coverage. An agent can review it with you quickly—want me to set that up?
That’s great to hear! Many of our clients still choose Funeral Advantage as a supplement to cover final expenses. It never hurts to compare—want to schedule a quick review with one of our agents?
Totally understand. Can I have an agent check in next week or send you some info to look over in the meantime?
The Accidental Death & Dismemberment Rider adds extra protection. It includes payouts for accidents, auto incidents, and even acts of war. Would you like an agent to explain the benefits and cost?

prompt: How do I become an agent?
completion: We’d love to work with you! You don’t need to be licensed yet—we help you through every step. Want me to send you the agent overview and connect you with a recruiter?
We received your request for information about burial insurance, or someone in your household may have submitted it. I can connect you with an agent to explain—would that be okay?
Yes, we offer a child rider that provides $5,000 in coverage per unit up to 5 units. The child must be under 18. Want to review it with an agent?

prompt: Is this a term or whole life policy?
completion: Funeral Advantage is a whole life policy, which means it never expires as long as premiums are paid. Want to go over the benefits with a licensed agent?
Great question! Coverage can begin right after approval—often the same day. Want an agent to walk you through how it works?
Yes, we offer same-day processing and advances when the application and payment are complete. I can have an agent explain the full process—okay to connect you?
Absolutely! We’re licensed in Texas and many other states. Want to chat with an agent in your area?

prompt: I have COPD, can I still qualify?
completion: COPD is considered a significant health condition, but you may still qualify for a Modified Benefit Plan. Let’s have a licensed agent go over your options with you.
Yes, you can apply for coverage on a loved one as long as there’s insurable interest. An agent can help you complete the application—want me to set that up?

prompt: What’s the minimum I can get?
completion: The minimum coverage starts at what $15/month can buy. Let’s go over your age and tobacco status with an agent to get exact numbers.

prompt: Do you pay for cremation too?
completion: Yes, your beneficiary can use the policy to cover funeral or cremation costs. Want to talk to an agent about how it works?

prompt: I'm interested but want to see some info first.
completion: Sure! I’ll send you a quick PDF and also set up a call with an agent who can answer your questions. When’s a good time?
Yes, you can pay monthly via bank draft or card. Let me connect you with an agent to set everything up.
